title: Ukrainian investigators seek to add billionaire Ferrexpo boss to international wanted list
text:
Prosecutors in Ukraine are seeking to place the billionaire boss of Ferrexpo on an international wanted list after claiming he failed to show up for questioning about his former company.

Kostyantin Zhevago, who is chief executive and 50pc owner of the FTSE 250 miner, was named as a suspect in absentia. Sources close to Ferrexpo could not say where he is now.

Court proceedings have now been launched to find him according to Roman Truba, the head of Ukraine’s State Bureau of Investigations, who held a press conference in Kiev on Wednesday.
